summary: Property lowerBound never defined on IDBKeyRange

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? Use IDBKeyRange.lowerBound (or upperBound, applies to both methods) What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Error thrown, according to the W3C IndexedDB spec, lowerBound is the correct method name. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Cygwin on Windows 7 x64, compiler-20110615 (currently latest) Please provide any additional information below. Wrong method names (leftBound, rightBound) instead of the correct ones (lowerBound, upperBound) in the w3c_indexeddb.js extern file.
This issue was closed by revision r1256.
